reasoning: Mixed histological type of breast cancer combining invasive ductal (70-80% of cases) and invasive lobular (10-15% of cases) carcinoma. Global breast cancer incidence from GLOBOCAN 2005 is ~45 per 100k women; estimated this specific histological combination at ~32.5 per 100k based on histological distribution patterns.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC), histological distribution from international cancer registries
